August U, 1950
Mr* Keith J. Nighbfert, Program director
Radio Station KUSD
University of South Dakota
Vermillion, South Dakota
Dear Mr* Nighbert:
Your note of August 1 has stunned all of us* We have been
working very hard on the network here, but yours is the first
gratuitous letter of enthusiasm that we have seen. I*m glad
that any of our efforts have been helpful to KUSD^ but even
moreso for the opportunity of getting to know you, even if only
through the mail.
With all best wishes, I am
Cordially yours,
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
